title: EDI Developer - USA-AZ-Phoenix
text: Overview:Position Responsibilities:Create a personal and professional relationship with business units to determine how EDI can assist in reducing cost or increasing revenue.Through consistent verbal contact, actively seek to understand each customer’s requirements, procedures, goals and how it relates to the over all businessDevelops applications for various business units that reduce man hours, increase accuracy, increase cash flow or increases customer satisfaction.Setup and/or modify trading partners and trading partner relationshipsDevelop new business process to support automationWorks with EDI Development staff to provide break fix analysis on existing processes.Assist in training of new EDI Development and Support Staff.Review EDI emails to ensure proper routing in requests and resolutionTroubleshoot reported errors and provide documentation / feedbackAssist in development of Kapow applicationsPosition Qualifications:Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Supply Chain, Management, Communications, Marketing, or other related fieldsCollege graduate or 1-5 years of experience in transportation industryMust be able to work some weekends on a rotation basisDemonstrated track record of achievement and successDesires a fast-paced, dynamic work environmentCompetitive and driven to be successfulWhy work for Knight Transportation:Fun, exciting, fast paced atmosphereHigh level of job securityGreat opportunity for promotionMedical insurance offered through Blue CrossDental insurance offered through AetnaVision insurance offered through DavisLife insurance offered through INGAll insurance is available after 60 days401K available after 1 yearKnight Transportation (KNX) is one of the nation’s leading transportation companies. We have been recognized byForbes 2014 Magazineas one of America’s 100 Most Trustworthy Companies.” Knight is ranked 14 of 8,000 publicly traded companies and the highest of any Transportation Company. Knight Transportation is a growing, innovative company that offers employees a rare opportunity to accelerate the advancement of their careers.ind123
